data.name: Kickback Slug: Cosmic Courier
data.detailed_description:
Kickback Slug: Cosmic Courier is an avoidance-based physics game where you must exploit the kickback of your arsenal to navigate a series of increasingly difficult obstacles.



Slippy and Mr McFly are committed to their job. As delivery drivers for the largest intergalactic trader of goods, they are held to high standards. However, their usual daily shift, and the chance of being named employees of the month, suffers a major blow when a mechanical failure causes their ship to crash land on a planet seemingly floating through space! Even worse, they have lost all of the parcels that now lay scattered across the planet’s surface...



Unbeknownst to all the aliens in the galaxy, the fate of their expected next-day deliveries lie within the tentacles of Slippy and McFly. Can you guide them across the planet and recover all of the lost parcels along the way?



  • Physics-based gameplay, requiring the use of weapon kickback to move.
  • Master the three main weapon types to quickly, and successfully, navigate the levels.
  • Sixty levels spanning across six zones, such as jungle, ice, mines, lava and even space itself.
  • Defeat bosses that guard access to new areas.
  • Unravel the mystery behind the planet’s existence.
  • Test your kickback skills by retrieving lost parcels hidden within every level.
  • Use the gallery screen to view your recovered parcels!

data.short_description: Kickback Slug: Cosmic Courier is an avoidance-based physics game where you must exploit the kickback of your arsenal to navigate a series of increasingly difficult obstacles.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
